name: one skein keyhole scarf
notes:
**showcase your skills with this 1 skein crochet keyhole scarf pattern! simple stitches are used which makes this an easy scarf to crochet.**

> **use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase.**

this pattern is part of the [2024 holiday stashdown crochet along][1]. this crochet along, now entering it's tenth year, allows crocheters to get a head start on their holiday crafting while also busting stash, learning new crochet techniques, chatting with others, and entering giveaways for awesome crochet prizes. use the hashtags - #calcentralcrochet and #holidaystashdowncal

**size:** one size adult – 38 x 6” (96.5 x 15 cm)

**stitches & techniques used:** chains, slip stitch, single crochet, half double crochet, double crochet, front and back loop, following instructions on how to make a beginning double crochet stitch, decrease stitch (sc2tog).

**yarn:** #4 worsted weight, we crochet mighty stitch – 20% superwash wool, 80% acrylic or expression fiber arts pearlescent worsted – 50% superwash merino wool, 50% mulberry silk; 200 total yards or suitable substitute 

**tools:** us size (h/8) 5.0 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge, yarn needle, scissors, blocking materials (optional)

**other:** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns.  

follow me on instagram: 
@simplyhookedbyjanet

join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts: https://www.facebook.com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet

copyright protected. you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos. you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer.


  [1]: https://undergroundcrafter.com/2024/09/30/2024-holiday-stashdown-crochet-along/
